record.title: SEQUENTIAL REFERRAL EXTENSION

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, as in executive session, I ask unanimous consent that the sequential referral of the nomination of Julia L. Myers, of Kansas, to be an Assistant Secretary of Homeland Security, to the Committee on Judiciary be extended until November 2, 2007; further that if the nomination is not reported at that time, the nomination then be automatically discharged and placed on the Executive Calendar.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
